price: 111. Y quien peque, lo hará en perjuicio propio; y Al-lah es Omnisciente y Sabio.
arabic: وَمَن يَكۡسِبۡ إِثۡمٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَكۡسِبُهُۥ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: waman yaksib ith'man fa-innamā yaksibuhu ʿalā nafsihi wakāna al-lahu ʿalīman ḥakīman
